articles.title: Would you look at the size of this puzzle cube in The Talos Principle 2’s upcoming expansion

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Door-and-peace-minus-the-peace FPS Anger Foot, the best game ever made, has finally got a release date: July 11th 2024. This is spectacular news, mainly because I’d already printed off a load of shirts that said ‘Anger Foot GOTY 2024.’ I was going to do some socks, too, but I do not trust this game anywhere near footwear.
 
Read more
articles.title: Door disrespecting FPS Anger Foot is out July 11th

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The creators of Hyper Light Drifter are not ones to rest. In the terrifying tidal wave of trailers that continually washes over us this weekend, they send word of a new game via the Devolver Direct. Possessor(s) is a side-scrolling character action game of mysterious sci-fi horror set in a "quarantined city ripped apart and flooded by an interdimensional catastrophe". This is coming on top of the already-announced Hyper Light Breaker. Please, Heart Machine, pace yourselves. I barely have time to play the daily crossword.
Read more
articles.title: Possessor(s) is a side-scroller from the folks behind Hyper Light Drifter

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Pow! Biff! Dead! Cells! Catch that plate I just threw you! And this one! Oh no, there’s another plate coming toward you, also thrown by me! And look, you don’t have any free hands left to catch this one! Eat plate! You have been well and truly beaten up, but that’s fine. Here’s something nice to take your mind off the pain. Tenjutsu is a new fluid and frenetic punchy-dudey action game from Dead Cells designer Sébastien Benard. 
 
Read more
articles.title: Tenjutsu is a speedy and stylish beat ‘em up from Dead Cells designer

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
Capcom's series about big beasts and the clothes you can skin/steal from them continues in Monster Hunter Wilds, which looked as great as ever in its newest trailer from tonight's Summer Game Fest show. We get new peeks at some lovely dunes, reptile-chicken mounts and bulky weapons. Oh, and some monsters ripe for huntin', presumably.

 
Read more
articles.title: Monster Hunter Wilds' new trailer shows sick cutscenes and lizard-worms that are gonna make even sicker pants

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
This year’s Day Of The Devs boasted an entire seven exclusives, plus a load of other nifty features and previews for exciting indies we already knew about, but are no less excited to be reminded of. It’s been over ten years now since Tim Schafer and the folks at Double Fine kicked off the non-profit initiative to help shine a spotlight on games what they thought were nice. No way! I love games what I think are nice! Here’s everything from Day Of The Devs 2024, dutifully arranged for your clicking pleasure.
Read more
articles.title: Everything announced and featured at Day Of The Devs 2024 in one place

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Enough moons ago to qualify as quite a lot of moons but not so much for me to categorise them as ‘many’, Alice Bee wrote about an Itch game called Kevin Costner’s Waterworld - a fully playable extrapolation of a Simpsons’ joke from three decades ago. Simpsons jokes from three decades making up most of my sense of humour, I of course thought it was brilliant. And yet, I couldn’t shake a singular, burning question: What if this, but not joke? Enter Tides Of Tomorrow. Ok, so I actually don't know if it has anything in common with Waterworld aside from having lots of water everywhere. Still, I'll never pass up an opportunity for a crispy Simpsons reference.
 
Read more
articles.title: We’re finally getting our big budget Kevin Costner’s Waterworld game in Tides Of Tomorrow

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
UFO 50 is a collection of fictional retro games designed as if they were made for a non-existent games console 40 years ago, but in reality have been developed as brand new titles for an upcoming collection from indie devs including Spelunky creator Derek Yu. With the ambitious project nearing a decade in its own development, though, those games have now taken on their own real history in addition to their made-up one. Those histories will meet this September, when UFO 50 finally sees the light of day.
Read more
articles.title: Spelunky creator’s mega-collection of fictional retro games UFO 50 will finally be out this September

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Before we get to the latest trailer for S-Game's soulslike Phantom Blade Zero I have a couple of complaints to lodge about the title. Firstly, this game clearly contains a non-zero quantity of blades, from whacking great axes to katanas. Secondly, I do not accept the premise that these are phantom blades. They are very obviously non-spectral, going by the amount of stabbing and clanging on show in the video. With these potentially ruinous caveats out of the way, I am now free to tell you more about a game that looks like it's out to eat Sekiro's lunch.
 
Read more
articles.title: Latest Phantom Blade Zero trailer sure makes it look like an over-powered Sekiro

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Are Tamagotchis a thing now again? I’m getting a sense they might be, but I’ll always associate them with the nineties. Ah, to return to a simpler time, where kids tripped each other up in the school hallways to steal toys , before Pokémon cards came along and everyone leveled up to stabbings. Sorry, Petal Runner devs, for opening a news article about your lovely wholesome game talking about stabbings. This gorgeous, fuschia-splashed, slice-of-life RPG is, if anything, the antidote to stabbings. In terms of game fatigue, anyway. It won’t cure tetanus, at least I don’t think so.
 
Read more
articles.title: Petal Runner is a slice-of-life Gameboy Advance style RPG about being a digital pet courier

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
When the Summer Game Fest trailer for "narrative-centric cosy game" Wanderstop said it was from the creator behind The Stanley Parable, I thought I had surely entered a different dimension where The Stanley Parable was actually a wholesome shop-keeping sim rather than a zig-zagging office-based nightmare. Then Wanderstop started to get rather bleak, and I finally stopped pinching myself. See for yourself.

 
Read more
articles.title: The Stanley Parable co-creator announces a tea-brewing sim that's secretly not-so-cosy

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
Things that weren’t on my Summer Game Fest bingo card: a surprise appearance from I Think You Should Leave’s Tim Robinson. Things also not on my Summer Geoff Fest bingo card: that Tim Robinson would show up to reassure us that, yes, Skate is still in the works.
Read more
articles.title: The new Skate resurfaces with a surprise Tim Robinson appearance, snippets of gameplay and plans for a playtest expansion

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Grid-based puzzler Grindstone was a favourite of Katharine’s, who found it to be her go-to during regularly scheduled moments of “cat-based paralysis”. I didn’t spent quite so many hours of feline enforced stasis with it, but I too was drawn in for a respectable time chunk. It’s those detail-stuffed visuals and caffeinated animations that tipped it for me, and it’s the same art that have me excited for Capybara’s follow-up. Battle Vision Network is an online puzzle battler that pits you head to head against real-life humans (boo those guys). The conceit here is its a televised space sport, in which you’ll steer the fate of its ongoing story arcs by winning or losing as your chosen team.
 
Read more
articles.title: Battle Vision Network is a competitive match-three puzzle battler from the makers of Grindstone

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Palworld is getting a lot of new things! I’m going to write the names of these new things now. I really hope they mean something to you. I want you to have nice things. Here are the new things coming to Palworld: a new island. Some new Pals. A new level cap. A new arena. A new subspecies. A new raid. A new oil rig stronghold. A new faction and boss. Maybe some other, secret things? All this newness comes as part of the ‘Sakurajima’ update, which releases on June 27th, 2024.
 
Read more
articles.title: Palworld’s Sakurajima update adds a new island and lots more and I can only assume that’s a good thing

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Night Springs is a fictional TV show within the world of Alan Wake 2, so of course that's also the focus of the meta-horror action game's expansion. It's three episodes, and it's out in under 24 hours.

 
Read more
articles.title: Alan Wake 2 is getting a three episode Night Springs expansion tomorrow

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Among Us developers Innersloth have announced Outersloth, a fund for independent game developers, alongside a bunch of games funded by the aforesaid fund for independent game developers. They all look rad, and Outersloth itself is a cool initiative.

 
Read more
articles.title: Among Us devs reveal indie game fund Outersloth alongside new games from the creators of Celeste, Venba and Thirsty Suitors

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Warframe-like “Next-gen looter shooter” The First Descendant releases this Summer, July 2nd 2024. The ‘next-gen’ part probably refers to Unreal Engine 5, and fair’s fair, it’s a real looker this one. The below trailer is mainly scripted or edited bits, but having played a chunk of the last technical test, there’s some genuinely impressive sci-fi vistas to behold, as well as some absolutely massive bosses. Click on the trailer below, until the purple hat or whatever it is you kids grind for these days, pops out with a synapse-tickling noise workshopped by psychologists for eighteen months.
 
Read more
articles.title: The First Descendant brings Warframe style looter shooting this July

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
I’m not familiar with the proto-internet cartoon Killer Bean, but Graham assures me it’s fairly important in the history of online animation. Regardless, I’ve been won over by the upcoming video game of the same name from original creator Jeff Lew, which looks to blend together Just Cause stunt shenanigans, John Woo slo-mo gunfights and the energy of a third-person action game you would’ve found in a bargain bin for the PlayStation 2 in 2002. It’ll hit early access this summer, courtesy of a fresh look from tonight’s Summer Game Fest showcase.
Read more
articles.title: Roguelike shooter Killer Bean brings its mix of Just Cause physics, Matrix gunfights and PS2 energy to early access this summer

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
In what is only the third ever piece of videogame-related media to make me weep at my keyboard, Volgar the Viking devs and retro specialists Digital Eclipse have announced a Power Rangers videogame - Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind. It's a 90s-style 2D brawler for up to five players, involves "time twisting", and has mode-7-esque arcade shooter bits together with its own spin on the TV show's climactic mecha transformation sequences.

 
Read more
articles.title: Digital Eclipse are making a new Power Rangers game with extreme Sonic Mania energy

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
A French game about mountain climbing? No, not that one. This is Cairn, not Jusant, and it’s actually a very different beast. Jusant could be tricky, but climbing was more the way you experienced its story. In survival climber Cairn, the ascent is the story. It seem to mainly be a story about how bad you are at climbing.
 
Read more
articles.title: Mountain climber Cairn is like Death Stranding meets an unforgiving Jusant

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Boheh Game Studio's horror game Slitterhead will release for PC on November 8th 2024, the developers have revealed at this year's Summer Game Fest. They've also popped up a new trailer, which is PS2 as hell, in what I consider to be the best of ways.
 
Read more
articles.title: Bokeh's Silent Hill and Siren-esque Slitterhead gets release date and new in-game trailer

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
Neva is immediately recognisable as the next puzzle platformer from the developers behind Gris thanks to its sweeping, overlapping planes and effortlessly natural watercolour art, which were both on show again in tonight’s Geoffest Summer Game Fest show. I was expecting more eye candy from Neva after its announcement last summer, but what caught me by surprise was all the hacking and slashing that ensues in its second trailer.

 
Read more
articles.title: Gris dev’s next gorgeous platformer Neva has all the emotional jumping you expect, plus the combat you don’t

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
It’s easy to draw comparisons between Metaphor: ReFantazio and Persona, given that the upcoming RPG is in the works over at Persona makers Atlus and is built around a similar ‘transform into an awesome-looking robot/creature and do battle’ concept, but so far all those comparisons only serve to highlight just how damn good Metaphor: ReFantazio looks.
Read more
articles.title: Metaphor: ReFantazio has over 40 persona-like archetypes to evolve and combine, still looks a lot like Persona (complimentary)

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Oh, this one looks nice, doesn’t it? Tears Of Metal is a rousing medieval stabathon that sees you retaking your Scottish island from a bunch of bad lads who’ve decided to come have a go, which was a bit silly of them, honestly. It’s a hack n’ slash co-op roguelike with some nifty looking strategy elements and a striking art style, but you can tell most of that from the trailer below:
 
Read more
articles.title: Tears Of Metal is a normal night out in Scotland with slightly more co-op roguelike stabbing

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Taking that famous quote from Romero’s Dawn Of The Dead, then sticking a ‘2’ on the end because that’s how sequels work, No More Room In Hell 2 is an eight player co-op horror from Chivalry 2 bods Torn Banner. It’s been teased for a while now, but now it’s got a release month: this October, 2024. Shamble hungrily toward the trailer below
 
Read more
articles.title: 8 player co-op zombie smasher No More Room In Hell 2 releases in early access this October

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
The way not-E3 games showcases work is that you open with something attention-getting an unexpected, end with the biggest game of the show, and pack the middling and mundane in the middle. Sid Meier's Civilization VII is surely one of the biggest announcements of this year's (in-progress, as I type this) Summer Game Fest 2024, and yet it was buried in that middle section, as unassuming as Sid himself.

 
Read more
articles.title: Sid Meier's Civilization 7 is coming in 2025, with more details in August

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Unbroken Studios and Warner Bros’ Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions will launch on 3rd September 2024, as announced at this year’s Summer Game Fest with a new trailer. It’s still a game about the Potterverse’s broomstick-riding sport, allowing players to compete against the computer and each other across various single player and multiplayer modes, and it’s still a new instalment in the world of an author, JK Rowling, who has a track record for transphobia.

 
Read more
articles.title: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions gets September release date in new trailer

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
Surprise! The next Horizon game after Zero Dawn and Forbidden West is also the next Lego game. Revealed during today's Summer games Fest showcase, Lego Horizon Adventures lets series heroine Aloy romp around with a pal in two-player co-op, and it’s coming to PC on the same day as it hits PlayStation.
Read more
articles.title: Lego Horizon Adventures follows Forbidden West with a co-op spin-off, and we won’t have to wait for it on PC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Z průzkumu, který projekt FreeBSD provedl v poslední době mezi svými uživateli, vyplývá řada zajímavostí. Podívejme se blíže, jak se dnes typicky FreeBSD používá i jaký je jeho uživatel.
articles.title: Uživatelé hodnotí FreeBSD v roce 2024: přidat na komunitě, díky za ZFS a stabilitu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Michal Tauchman)
articles.description: Disketovka k osmibitu byl dříve nedostižný sen, tak jsem si jednu koupil. V poslední části se budeme věnovat postupu, jak vytvořit vlastní disketu a také, jak se projeví použití cartridge Fast Load.
articles.title: Commodore 1541-II: vytváření vlastních disket a použití cartridge Fast Load

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Pipeline je v současném IT jedno z nejzneužívanějších slov. V jazyku Coconut lze pipeline používat ve smyslu kolon, tedy pro zajištění předávání návratových hodnot funkcí do jiných funkcí, což je základ tacit programmingu.
articles.title: Konstrukce kolon a kompozice funkcí v jazyku Coconut

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: The Mirror, alternativa ke hře Roblox, uvolnil svůj zdrojový kód. Neoficiální port hry Zelda se jmenuje 2 Ship 2 Harkinian. Klasika Descent 3 od Outrage Entertainment je nyní k dispozici pod svobodnou licencí.
articles.title: Hra The Mirror je open-source, klon Zeldy se jmenuje 2 Ship 2 Harkinian

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: V dnešní sklizni se ponoříme do světa komunikace, bezpečnosti a prezentací. Představíme si nástroje, které vám umožní udržet kontakt s vaším sociálním okruhem, ochránit vaše digitální data a prezentovat vaše myšlenky v terminálu.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (12. 6. 2024): jedna aplikace na všechny komunikační sítě

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Ve čtvrtek 6. června proběhlo tradiční setkání k příležitosti Dne IPv6. Přechod na internetový protokol nové generace nepřináší jenom technické výzvy (o kterých se také mluvilo), ale i řadu organizačních překážek.
articles.title: Česko samo přechod na IPv6 nezvládne, trh to nevyřeší, říká Ondřej Filip

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Monika Kutějová)
articles.description: V dnešním vydání postřehů se podíváme na masivní únik dat Ticketmasteru, několikastupňový útok na Ukrajinu, spolupráci čínských skupin na kyberšpionážní kampani nebo malware Decoy Dog útočící na Rusko.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: spolupráce čínských skupin a zero-day v TikToku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Edice openSUSE Aeon Desktop RC2 získává nové funkce. Opera ve spolupráci se společností Google představila novou funkci, která uživatelům umožňuje generovat obrázky pomocí umělé inteligence. Ubuntu 23.10 končí podpora.
articles.title: Aeon Desktop se formuje, Opera bude umět generovat obrázky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Google posílá do projektu Mesa podporu Fuchsia OS, 40 let od uvedení původního Tetrisu, OBS Studio 30.2 Beta přináší nativní podporu NVENC, 70 let od úmrtí Alana Turinga.
articles.title: KDE Plasma 6.1 blíže, OBS Studio s podporou NVENC na Linuxu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Mezi všemi těmi Apple Silicony a Qualcommy Elite X by člověk mohl přehlédnout, že x86 se má stále k světu. Po Computextu už ale ne, jak AMD, tak Intel ukazují světu, co za skoky vpřed chystají.
articles.title: AMD Zen 5 a Intel Lunar/Arrow Lake se představují: závěr roku ve znamení x86

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Google oznámil přechod ChromeOS ze standardního linuxového jádra na jádro ze systému Android. Důvodem je integrace frameworků z Androidu s cílem jednoduše používat aplikace z Androidu v ChromeOS bez mezivrstev.
articles.title: ChromeOS opouští čisté linuxové jádro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Canonical dnes zveřejnil informace o počítači DC-ROMA RISC-V II od společnosti DeepComputing. Půjde o osmijádrový notebook s procesorem využívajícím architekturu RISC-V, na kterém bude předinstalovaná linuxová distribuce Ubuntu.
articles.title: DC-ROMA II bude osmijádrový notebook s RISC-V a Ubuntu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Nadace FreeBSD Foundation zveřejnila výsledky průzkumu v komunitě FreeBSD, ve kterém se snažila zjistit zajímavé informace o uživatelích FreeBSD a jejich způsobu používání tohoto operačního systému. Průzkum obsahoval 50 otázek a zúčastnilo se ho 1446 uživatelů.
articles.title: Komunita okolo FreeBSD vidí ZFS jako nejcennější serverovou funkci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Rok po vydání openSUSE Leap 15.5 byla dle očekávání vydána nová verze 15.6, která představuje dílčí aktualizaci s plánovanou podporou do konce roku 2025, což by mělo dát uživatelům dostatek prostoru pro přechod na tak trochu revoluční verzi 16.
articles.title: openSUSE Leap 15.6 vylepšuje podporu kontejnerů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Společnost Vodafone krátce po blokaci domén datoid.cz a datoid.sk začala blokovat domény edisk.cz a sledujteto.cz. Uživatelům se stejně jako v předchozím případě zobrazuje informace, že je web blokován na základě zákona o hazardu.
articles.title: Vodafone blokuje domény edisk.cz a sledujteto.cz na základě předběžného opatření

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nové vydání balíku systemd je na světě a s ním již dříve avizovaná implementace náhrady za sudo, tedy nástroj run0.
articles.title: Nová verze systemd 256 s run0, systemd-vpick či importctl

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Vedení organizace ICANN dnes v rwandském Kigali oznámilo, že následující ICANN Policy Forum proběhne příští červen v Praze. Jedna z vrcholných akcí organizace ICANN se do Česka vrátí po třinácti letech a sdružení CZ.NIC bude opět jejím hostitelem.
articles.title: Praha opět přivítá jednu z tradičních konferencí organizace ICANN

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: HTTPS se stává běžným, většina webů už ho nasadila. Jak to ale udělat správně, opravdu bezpečně a hlavně bezbolestně? Na školení HTTPS pro správce serverů si ukážeme si nejnovější trendy, prakticky si vyzkoušíme vygenerování certifikátu a nasazení na web server.
articles.title: HTTPS pro správce serverů (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jsme na cestě, hlásí Koichiro Iwao o AlmaLinuxu a Raspberry Pi 5. Práce na podpoře poslední generace malinového stroječku založili vývojáři na obrazech pro předchozí verzi. Koichiro konstatuje, že jádro systému použité v buildech AlmaLinuxu pro Raspberry Pi typicky zakládá na jádru, které v rámci CentOS připravuje Pablo Greco. Pak už „jen“ stačilo naučit se bootovací proces a rozdíly mezi čtyřkou a pětkou.
articles.title: AlmaLinux s podporou Raspberry Pi 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Kolem Intel oneAPI loni na podzim vystavěná nadace UXL (Unified Acceleration Foundation) ve spolupráci s Khronos Group oznamují další logický krok: oficiálně běžící spolupráci The Khronos Group, stojící mimo jiné za standardy OpenGL A Vulkan, a samotné UXL Foundation.
articles.title: Nadace UXL (oneAPI) navazuje spolupráci s Khronos Group

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Společnost Tuxedo hodlá v budoucnu nabídnout i notebook postavený na ARM SoC Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite. Prototyp ukázala na letošním Computexu, šlo o 14palcový stroj s displejem o rozlišení 2560×1600 s 32GB LPDDR5X pamětí a PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD.
articles.title: Tuxedo připravuje linuxový notebook se Snapdragonem X Elite

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Počínaje Firefoxem 127, jenž již leží hotový na FTP serverech Mozilly (novinky budou časem shrnuty v obvyklém přehledu, prozatím vezměme zavděk beta verzí), se bude 32bitová verze pro Linux tvářit navenek jako „x86_64“, a to ryze kvůli skutečnosti, že 32bitových instalací už je tak malé množství, že by sama tato informace mohla přispívat k fingerprintingu daného uživatele.
articles.title: Firefox 127 předstírá u 32bitové verze, že je 64bitový

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Dorka Volavkova)
articles.description: V čtvrtek 13. června začíná v Brně na FIT VUT třídenní konference DevConf.CZ. Vstup na konferenci je zdarma, ale je nutné se registrovat. Zbývá už jen pár míst, proto doporučujeme se registrovat co nejdříve. Pokud se nemůžete zúčastnit osobně, konferenci můžete sledovat také živě prostřednictvím youtubového kanálu.
articles.title: Konference DevConf.CZ 2024 začíná tento týden

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V PHP od verze 5.x byla před měsícem ve Windows objevena kritická zranitelnost CVE-2024–4577. Chyba může způsobit vzdálené spuštění kódu. Zranitelné je PHP-CGI, ale může být zneužito, i když není nakonfigurováno. Stačí aby php-cgi.exe bylo v adresáři, kam se dostane webserver. Zranitelné jsou tedy patrně všechny výchozí instalace XAMPP na Windows.
articles.title: Kritická zranitelnost v PHP pro Windows

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jason Donenfeld, vývojář WireGuardu, před dvěma roky navrhl kryptograficky bezpečnou funkci getrandom() ve vDSO (virtual dynamic shared object). Tím pádem by šla využívat i v user-space. Důraz je kladen na bezpečnou inicializaci generátoru.
articles.title: Jason Donenfeld stále pracuje na getrandom() ve vDSO

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Dnes má podle některých kalendářů svátek Git(a). Vše nejlepší!
articles.title: Dnes má svátek Git(a)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: MichalVaclavik)
articles.description: V stredu 12. 6. 2024 o 09:00h je pre vás pripravený ďalší webinár zdarma. Spoločne si prejdeme súhrn všetkých nových, dôležitých funkcionalít LTS verzie Zabbix 7.0.
articles.title: Webinár Zabbix 7.0 - Súhrn nových dôležitých funkcionalít

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: svatas)
articles.description: V únoru 2024 provedla společnost Adobe v tichosti změny podmínek vztahujících se k jejich softwarovým produktům a uživatelé si změny nevšimli.
articles.title: Změna podmínek služeb Adobe budí rozpaky a kontroverze

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nový AI pomocník ve Windows 11 Recall, který zaznamenává snímky obrazovky vaší práce na počítači, u uživatelů vzbudil obavy o soukromí. Na to v pátek reagoval viceprezident Windows & Devices Pavan Davuluri. Nově bude Recall opt-in, tedy ve výchozím stavu bude Recall vypnutý a uživatel ho bude muset zapnout.
articles.title: Windows 11 Recall bude opt-in a bude mít dodatečné šifrování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Již tuto středu 12. června se uskuteční webinář „Co je nového v Zabbixu 7.0“. Tento webinář pokryje nejnovější funkce Zabbixu, jako jsou nové widgety, rozšířená dostupnost widgetů v šablonách, Zabbix Proxy v režimu vysoké dostupnosti (HA), nový item Browser, rozšířená možnost úprav uživatelských médií u JIT a nativní dvoufaktorová autentifikace (MFA). Zmíněny budou také změny týkající se výkonu a mnoho dalších novinek.
articles.title: Webinář: Co je nového v Zabbixu 7.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Na základě předběžného opatření, které vydal Krajský soud v Brně, zablokovali čeští operátoři O2, Vodafone, T-Mobile a několik dalších přístup k doménám datoid.cz a datoid.sk. Uživatelům připojeným přes O2 odpovídají DNS resolvery chybou NXDOMAIN.
articles.title: O2, Vodafone, T-Mobile a další blokují přístup k doménám datoid.cz a datoid.sk

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojář Intelu Srinivas Pandruvada poslal včera do jádra nové nastavení EPP (Energy Performance Preference) pro mobilní procesory Intel Meteor Lake. To může mít hodnotu 0–255, vyšší hodnoty mají nižší výkon, ale spoří energii. Výchozí hodnota pro balance_performance (provoz ze sítě) je snížena ze 115 na 64. To zlepšuje výkon o 2–19 % a také výkon na Watt o 0,3–11,5 %.
articles.title: Nové nastavení EPP pro Intel Meteor Lake vylepšuje výkon i spotřebu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Meta hodlá trénovat své AI na datech z Facebooku s výjimkou soukromých zpráv mezi přáteli a rodinou. K tomu mají být využita data od roku 2007. articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
As you embark on the Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance journey, be prepared for a series of pivotal decisions. The first of these will confront you right at the beginning, offering two paths: 'Take her hand' or 'Don't take her hand.' This choice is not to be taken lightly, as it will shape your entire experience in SMT V: Vengeance. We're here to guide you toward the most beneficial outcome.


SMT V: Vengeance take the hand decision guide


When you reach out to the body in the early cutscenes of SMT V: Vengeance, a voice will tell you that this girl is not ready to exist quite yet. You'll choose to either reach out to her or ignore it. Grab the girl's hand to experience the new storyline, Canon of Vengeance. On the other hand, don't grab the girl's hand if you wish to check out SMT V's original narrative, Canon of Creation. Newcomers may be inclined to take this route to see what events transpired in the original version. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


Although Canon of Vengeance could be seen as the 'evil route,' it's the only way to access the brand-new story. This pathway may involve more morally ambiguous choices and darker themes. It'll still follow a similar route to the original but with a few twists and turns. Vengeance's new character will also join your party frequently, resulting in exclusive dialogue and cutscenes. She's honestly a pretty good ally to have and can make battles much more accessible.


Even if you're a beginner, you can still take the hand if you so desire. Like most SMT entries, Vengeance is a standalone experience, meaning you can enjoy the new content without feeling lost or overwhelmed by the game's lore or previous entries. Of course, it's entirely up to you to make the final decision. Plus, the game allows you to revert your choice at this point if you happen to change your mind. 

The post Should you take the hand or not in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Should you take the hand or not in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance?

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance pits you against several new enemies, separate from those in the original storyline. Naamah is one of the first bosses you'll need to eliminate during The Angel's Trail quest. We're here to help guide you through Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance's Naamah boss battle with a few tips and tricks.


Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance Naamah boss guide 


Although Naamah is a part of Vengeance's early stages, she can be ruthless if you don't prepare for it. To get ready for this battle, I suggest loading up on Amrita Sodas or having an ally that cures status ailments. It would help if you also got your party around Level 18, the same ranking as Naamah during this showdown.


Naamah has a weakness to Physical Attacks but is resistant to magic. That means abilities lik…
articles.title: How to defeat Naamah in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Every time you advance further in Da'at, the elite Qadištu group will always try to stop you in your tracks. Naamah will be one of the first members you encounter, followed by the sinister Eisheth. Here's how to defeat Eisheth in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance. 


SMT V: Vengeance Eisheth boss guide


Before you face off against Eisheth in SMT V: Vengeance, it's crucial to prepare your party. She will be at Level 28, so ensure your team is at this ranking first. I always like using Auto Battle to make the grind feel less tedious.


Eisheth is weak to Force attacks and is resistant to Dark and Fire strikes. Equipping skills like Zan and Mazan can significantly damage her. Use the World of Shadows' Essence Fusion to obtain these talents from the demons, giving you a confident edge in the ba…
articles.title: How to defeat Eisheth in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Choosing the right party members can be difficult, especially when there is a wide variety to select from. We're here to help you narrow down your choices by showing you the best Demons to use in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance.


What are the best Demons to use in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance?


During the beginning stages of SMT V: Vengeance, your choices for Demons are reasonably limited. However, you'll stumble across even more fiends as you get farther into the story. For our best-of list, we'll start out with the best Demons to use in the early parts of the game and then gradually work up through the higher levels.


Neko Shogun


Screenshot by Destructoid


Although you may be distracted by Neko Shogun's adorableness, this Demon is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. …
articles.title: Best Demons to use in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Although you would think combat is one of the most challenging aspects of Vengeance, the game's quizzes can often be a tough nut to crack. You'll encounter these tests a few times, primarily when asking a Demon to join your crew. However, the side quest, In Pursuit of Knowledge, takes this a step further by asking a series of difficult questions. Here's how to complete In Pursuit of Knowledge in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance.


All answers to In Pursuit of Knowledge quest in SMT V: Vengeance


In Pursuit of Knowledge's quest start can be found above the Jouin U. Medical Research Lab in Azabu. Speak to the Jouin Student to begin the test. Then, select the following prompts to get the correct answers in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance's In Pursuit of Knowledge mission:



The demon Onmoraki is a monstrous bird with a human face. What is its original form?

Human corpse




Amongst the hierarchy of demons, what is the name of the evil spirit from which the word "demon" originates?

Cacodaemon




What should you do to remove the omelet-loving spirit Aitvaras from your home?

Light a candle





Whenever you pick the wrong answers in the In Pursuit of Knowledge quest, the Jouin Student will send you away until you've chosen the correct one. No matter what, players will earn the same rewards, regardless if they've picked the wrong selections.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Completing the In Pursuit of Knowledge in SMT V: Vengeance earns you the Treacherous Order Periapt. This allows two demons of the Dark to utilize a Law alignment, offering the Magatsuhi Skill. The Treacherous Order Periapt provides a large amount of MP to all allies and a '1 Press Turn' icon to your next turn. You can use demons from the Vile and Raptor races to make use of this skill.

The post How to complete In Pursuit of Knowledge in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to complete In Pursuit of Knowledge in Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Minecraft's 1.21 update, also known as the Tricky Trials update, introduced the Trial Chambers, mace weapon, and various reward items to spice up the game. However, to access these features, you'll need to know where to find the trial chambers and what to expect as you explore them.


Where to find a Trial Chamber in Minecraft


There are three ways to find trial chambers in Minecraft:



Search around the world on foot.


Buy a Trial Explorer map from a cartographer villager.


Teleport using console commands.



Trial Chambers are structures you'll find by digging underground, much like how you'd encounter an Ancient City or mineshaft. Unlike lush caves, nothing in the overworld indicates when you're approaching one. Instead, you'll have to look out for tuff bricks as you're mining, as t…
articles.title: How to find a Trial Chamber in Minecraft

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Fortnite's Loot Island has been revamped slightly during the Fortnite x Metallica collaboration, with music blasting, a new capture system, and some fun visuals to reflect the theme. Visiting this island will help you progress through Metallica quests and give you a chance to get some powerful loot. 


How to visit the floating Metallica Loot Island stage in Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 3


Much like the regular Loot Island, the Metallica iteration spawns randomly after four to five storms have passed. As you near the end of your Fortnite match, you'll spot Metallica's signature "M" in the sky, signaling the island's arrival. You'll also find a rift symbol on your map to pinpoint its exact location.


Screenshot by Destructoid


In other words, your first challenge is to stay alive this long…
articles.title: How to find the floating Metallica Loot Island stage in Fortnite

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
The new Density Enchantment was added to Minecraft in the version 1.21 update on both Java and Bedrock editions. This is the first new enchantment added to Minecraft in a while, and it's unique because it is only available on Mace weapons. Here's how the Density Enchantment in Minecraft works as well as how you can get it and what to do with it.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to get the Density Enchantment


Like most Enchantments in Minecraft, you'll need to use an Enchanting Table to get the Density Enchantment on your weapon. You can only get the Density Enchantment on a Mace weapon, as this enchantment is exclusive to Maces only and will not work on other weapons like the Sword.


You can also find the Density Enchantment already enchanted in the form of Enchanted Books throughout t…
articles.title: How the Density Enchantment in Minecraft works

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
The Winnower has always been a part of the Destiny universe. It's the idea of a devil, the concept of something that isn't exactly the essence of destruction but more a being that wants the universe to evolve in a specific way. In contrast, its opposition wants something more for their creations. 


We've had lore entries hinting at the Winnower in Destiny and Destiny 2 before, but the Salvation's Edge raid confirms that it exists and adds some context to what exactly it is. You'd be forgiven for not knowing what this is because it's something you'd only really have heard about by reading text entries in the games, and I'm certainly guilty of ignoring those for the most part. That's why I've explained what the Winnower is in Destiny 2 here as plainly as I can. 


What is the Winnower in De…
articles.title: What is the Winnower in Destiny 2?

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
In Fallout 76, Mirelurks are a nice source of armor, Softshell Mirelurk Meat, and Mirelurk Eggs, all of which can be extremely useful. As you head into the Fallout 76 Skyline Valley update you're probably going to want to farm MIrelurks to prepare. Here are all the best places to find Murelarks and farm them with the Fallout 76 Skyline Valey update.





Best places to farm Mirelurks


In general, Mirelurks are found near watery areas as they are essentially mutated hermit crab crustaceans. Unfortunately, Mirelurks are kind of rare in comparison to most other enemies in Fallout 76. However, there are several spots where there are guaranteed to be some Mirelurk spawns that you can run around and cycle through between respawns. Your best bet is to do this on a Private World, just to rule out…
articles.title: Best places to find Mirelurks in Fallout 76 Skyline Valley update

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
An Unlikely Invitation is the first quest you must complete to access the Skyline Valley update in Fallout 76. This update might not allow you to play as a Ghoul, but it does open up an interesting new location and the opportunity to delve for more loot, so it's well worth jumping into. 


You'll pick up An Unlikely Invitation when you next launch Fallout 76. The quest is automatically added under Main Quests on your PipBoy. You should open it and track it so you can follow each step as it evolves because this one involves a lot of trekking across the map. However, first, it's time to turn on your radio and figure out what's going on in the Appalachian Wasteland that's got so many people worked up. 


How to complete An Unlikely Invitation in Fallout 76


Below, I've outlined how to comple…
articles.title: How to complete An Unlikely Invitation in Fallout 76

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Just Crow Things is the latest chaotic game release from Unbound Creations, the studio who also brought us such gems as Rain on Your Parade and Leafblower Man. I wasn’t expecting much when I downloaded the Steam Next Fest demo, but what I got was so much better than I could have imagined.


In Just Crow Things, you play as a Crow, which should be pretty obvious given the title. If you’ve played Rain on Your Parade at any point, you’ll know what to expect from Just Crow Things, but if you haven’t, let me explain. 


As your customizable Crow (mine looks like a Chicken), you can fly around different levels and cause havoc. You can poop on unsuspecting humans below at will, steal shiny objects, and use tools such as a Flamethrower, an animal summoning musical flute, and an overpowered Leafblo…
articles.title: Just Crow Things is such beautiful chaos, packed into a single demo

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Vessel Capillaries are an important resource to get in Warframe because that’s how you get Dante, his signature weapons, and other miscellaneous items regarding the Sanctun Anatomica. 


If you’re looking to get this fast, we have the methods on how to get it and the best way to farm it. 


How to get Vessel Capillaries in Warframe


To get Vessel Capillaries in Warframe, you have to play the Disruption mission, Armatus, on Deimos. It can be accessed after completing the Whispers in the Walls quest.


You can access this mission either through a Bounty given by Fibonacci or by just accessing it on the Star Chart. In any case, you’ll just play the Disruption mission like you do on any other planet, but you have to destroy the Demolisher Necramechs that spawn.


Each killed Necramech will dr…
articles.title: How to get and farm Vessel Capillaries in Warframe

articles.author: Moulik Mathur
articles.description:
PlayStation 5 users can finally join Discord voice chat directly from their console, thanks to the rollout of a new system update. The PS5 update will roll out gradually over the coming weeks for all accounts. 


With the coming update, PS5 players will be able to join a Discord voice chat without any need to rely on Discord PC or mobile application.


How to join Discord voice chat on PS5


Once the update becomes available, install it. You also need to make sure that your PlayStation Network and Discord accounts are linked. Open the Discord tab in Game Base. For those unfamiliar, the Game Base is part of the PS5 Control Center. Then, choose the desired Discord server or DM group. After selecting your preferred voice channel, you will see more details such as the existing Discord members in the channel. 


The new update will also bring PS5 console notification whenever a Discord user calls you, and opening that notification will allow you to instantly join the Discord voice chat on your PS5.


Sony is rolling out the update gradually in all regions, starting with Japan/Asia. The update will then be made available in Europe, Australia/New Zealand, and the Middle East, followed by the Americas.


Profile Share featuring coming next week


Image via PlayStation Blog


Moreover, Sony is also rolling out the Profile Share feature next week. This feature will allow players to share their PlayStation Network profile on messaging, and social apps. To share your PSN profile, select “Share Profile” from the PlayStation App or the PS5 console. This will create a shareable link or QR code. When the intended recipient opens the link or scans the QR code, they will receive the option to add you as a friend on the PlayStation Network.

The post PlayStation 5 players can soon join Discord voice chat directly from their console after upcoming update appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: PlayStation 5 players can soon join Discord voice chat directly from their console after upcoming update

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
A recent report by PC Gamer has revealed more about the tumultuous climate at Disco Elysium developer ZA/UM. Featuring interviews with current and past employees at the company, it’s been revealed that a stand-alone expansion for Disco Elysium was well into development when it was canceled, and much of the team was laid off.


Disco Elysium was released in 2019 to wide acclaim, and it seemed like fertile ground for ZA/UM to develop a series around. However, in 2022, three of the lead developers on the team, Robert Kurvitz, Aleksander Rostov, and Helen Hindpere, departed. Reports on these departures are conflicting, with Kurvitz and Rostov accusing the management of financial malfeasance, while official statements from the company say that they were fired for misconduct.


Business continue…
articles.title: A new report details the turmoil around scrapped Disco Elysium follow-up

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Starting today at 10 a.m. PST, players in Palia have a chance to band together and "bug out" as they strive to catch 25 million collective insects. If the goal is reached, all players will receive some special rewards.


Apparently, Tish bet Auni that he couldn’t catch 25 million insects before June 20, which seems a little unfair coming from a grown woman aimed at a child boasting just a net and some Smoke Bombs. However, that’s where we come in. 


Thankfully, in return for our help, Auni is willing to share the loot and if he wins the bet, we’ll get the following rewards:



Leafy Flutterfox Plush, a brand new plush designed with the Spring season in mind


3 Mixed Hydrangea flower seedlings



In order to get these rewards, you’ll need to log in between 11 a.m. PST on June 20 and 7 a.m. on June 25. If you do, you can expect to have some mail waiting for you from Auni, including the loot. 


Image via Singularity 6


Now I know, 25 million seems like a gargantuan amount of insects (I hope we’re releasing them afterwards, or there’s going to be a bit of an infestation going on somewhere), but the dev team at Singularity 6 have some advice to offer. 


They recommend joining the official Palia Discord server, where there is a dedicated Bug Hunting channel where people can organize groups to head out in search of bugs to catch. I can attest to this, as the channel is currently the most active on the whole server. 


They also recommend crafting and using Honey Lures. This item is used to attract insects to your location for three minutes. To unlock the Honey Lure recipe, you’ll need to reach at least level 7 in Bug Catching and the recipe costs 2,000 Gold. You can also purchase them for 75 Bug Catching Medals once you reach level 10.

The post Insect-a-Palooza is coming to Palia with exclusive rewards up for grabs appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Insect-a-Palooza is coming to Palia with exclusive rewards up for grabs

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Long after its 2019 release, the Kingdom Hearts 3 mod scene is still thriving, especially with the Steam launch this week. And thanks to one modder, Larxian, Final Fantasy may have a little more to explore in Kingdom Hearts as they've dropped Sora right into the Final Fantasy 15 city, Insomnia, with their in-development mod. 


Sora uses his flowmotion abilities all over Insomnia


Insomnia is the crown city of Final Fantasy 15, in which Noctis lived throughout his childhood and he returns to later in life. In this mod, we can play as Sora swinging on the architecture of the city and zooming from place to place in an instant. It's reminiscent of Noctis maneuvering his way around the skyscraper in the initial Final Fantasy Versus XIII reveal trailer...just less gory, a little more Disney. 




Larxian began to share details on social media about the mod project in March 2023. They have since added NPCs to the city and even included a Moogle Shop. The modder tracks their progress on X, and you can follow along by searching for #InsomniaMod. While there's no ETA just yet, it looks like they've made plenty of headway in bringing Insomnia to life. 


This Kingdom Hearts 3 mod might be the beginning of what's to come


Ever since the Kingdom Hearts 3 secret movie, many fans have speculated on the parallels between the Versus XIII marketing and the secret movie. It's all thanks to Kingdom Hearts director Tetsuya Nomura's history as the director of the Versus XIII project before it transitioned to Final Fantasy 15. One of the last shots of the Kingdom Hearts 3 Re: Mind secret movie is influenced by the scene in which Noctis is sitting at the back of a limousine car, looking out towards the window. Yozora is doing the exact same motion. 




Perhaps in Kingdom Hearts 4, we'll see Quadratum's version of Insomnia and the skyscraper, like those we see in this mod. 

The post Sora explores Final Fantasy 15 city in Kingdom Hearts 3 mod appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Sora explores Final Fantasy 15 city in Kingdom Hearts 3 mod

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Developer Behaviour Interactive completely reworked how the Twisted Masquerade Event works in Dead by Daylight for 2024. It has new mechanics to master that can give you an advantage as both the Killer and Survivor in every Trial, but only if you know how to work them. 


2024's version of the Twisted Masquerade in Dead by Daylight has Invitations, though not as you know them, and Tryks, which completely change the game in a Trial. Each is designed to give you an advantage. Tryks occur after meeting set requirements and are out of your control, but Invitations add abilities to your Survivor, allowing you to access powers that would usually require Perks for you to activate. 


How Tryks work in Dead by Daylight Twisted Masquerade 2024


Screenshot by Destructoid


Tryks is an NPC in Dead b…
articles.title: Dead by Daylight Twisted Masquerade: How Tryks and Invitations work

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
There's no point in spreading Managed Democracy throughout the galaxy if you can't be fashionable while doing it. Okay, so all the armor sets in Helldivers 2 sport a clear purpose, but with that gear and cape, you can't argue that Helldivers have an immaculate drip.


Helldivers 2 has 51 armor sets to mix and match. They're separated into three types — Heavy, Medium, and Light — and come equipped with an Armor Passive that gives you a small boon. Developer Arrowhead Games is constantly delivering more armor sets via monthly Warbonds and the Superstore, so be sure to keep an eye out for more ways to increase your style points.


All Armor Passives in Helldivers 2 and what they do


There are nine Armor Passives in Helldivers 2 and each offers different buffs. Knowing what they do can help y…
articles.title: All Helldivers 2 armor sets

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
It’s safe to say that there are a lot of games included as part of Steam’s Next Fest, but I’ve scrolled through all of them (yes, all of them, it took me a very long time) and downloaded all of the coziest games I could find. 


Some of these games offer pure cozy vibes, while others may be better described as cozy-adjacent. They’re not all life-sims, but they all offer something unique and provided me with positive vibes while I played. Here’s the ten that came out on top in my playtesting. 


Garden Witch Life


Screenshot by Destructoid


For at least 15 years now, I’ve had a hankering for a game which gave me the same satisfaction as Cooking Mama. I didn’t expect to find it in a game about a girl who just lost her job and is looking for her place in life, but Garden Witch Life scratche…
articles.title: 10 cozy demos to get lost in this Steam Next Fest

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
Over the last few years, I've grown increasingly fond of playing demos over watching game trailers. Trailers can be fun (as I found myself squealing over the recent Xbox Showcase announcements), but there's nothing like playing a small slice of a game and seeing your excitement for a game jump massively. 


Steam's Next Fest events are a great source of demos, but the sheer amount can be daunting to sort through. That's why I've curated a list of game demos that are well worth your time. Here are the 10 of what I consider the best Steam Next Fest demos of June 2024.


10 must-play Steam Next Fest demos in the June 2024 event


I've listed 10 of my favorite demos from the Fest below, but don't shy away from trying more if you get the chance. For example, GMTK's Mind Over Magnet was very clo…
articles.title: 10 Steam Next Fest demos you need to play before it’s over

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
The Fortnite x Metallica event is now live, with several cosmetics, quests, and Metallica skins available to obtain. If you're trying to finish every quest, you'll have to learn how to spray Metallica concert images around the map to show your dedication and spread the word. 


How to spray Metallica concert images in Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 3


Spraying Metallica concert images during the Chapter 5, Season 3 event requires travelling to three different locations around Fortnite's map, opening your emote wheel, and using a Metallica spray on the location. You won't have to unlock the spray beforehand, as it'll automatically appear as the only option in your emote wheel once you approach a spot.


There are three named locations you can visit to spray Metallica images:



Sandy Steppes


Restored Reels


Reckless Railways



Each POI has two spray locations you can use, so you only need to visit two landmarks if you get two in one spot. Since you only need three of the six available spray locations, you can use the spray at two walls in one area before quickly running to another and getting one last spray down. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


You also don't need to get all three sprays down during one match. If you land in a POI, get a spray or two down, and then are eliminated during a fight, you can hop in during your next round and finish the quest. Finishing it in one go makes the process slightly faster, but generally speaking, you don't have to stress about it too much.


Once you finish the Metallica event quest, you'll unlock the Lightning Star spray to use during any of your matches. You'll also get one step closer to completing every quest, rewarding you with posters, emotes, and more. 

The post How to spray Metallica concert images at different locations in Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to spray Metallica concert images at different locations in Fortnite

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Leaked reports that a Final Fantasy Tactics remaster is in development have been confirmed by Bloomberg journalist Jason Schreier’s verified Reddit account today.


Rumors have been circulating since 2021, when a leak of the Geforce Now games database suggested its existence. Since then, other games named on that list have been released or announced, suggesting the accuracy of it.


The Reddit thread is part of revelations around the prolific leaker of information about Sega and Atlus, Midori. News about their identity raised discussion over the accuracy of their previous leaks, with the thread singling out reports that Visions of Mana is being delayed on PS4. A comment questioning the Final Fantasy Tactics remaster was brought up by another user, and noted newshound Jason Schreier stepped in to say, “Hi. The Final Fantasy Tactics remaster is real and happening.”


This news is not arriving from Square Enix, so it shouldn’t be taken as official confirmation. However, the Reddit account is verified as belonging to Bloomberg journalist Jason Schreier, and he is a generally reliable source.


A remaster of 1997’s Final Fantasy Tactics wouldn’t be all that surprising, as Tactics Ogre just received a similar treatment in 2022, and the two games are cut from the same cloth. A suggested remake of Final Fantasy IX was also part of the Geforce Now leak, which is a much more difficult-to-believe possibility, but given the accuracy of the list so far, anything could happen.

The post Rumored Final Fantasy Tactics remaster is reportedly ‘real and happening’ appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Rumored Final Fantasy Tactics remaster is reportedly ‘real and happening’

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Dead by Daylight's Twisted Masquerade event for 2024 might be the best we've ever had. It introduces new systems that keep the Twisted Masquerade game mode interesting while adding new cosmetics to earn and, most importantly, a new Event Tome. 


The Event Tome for Dead by Daylight Twisted Masquerade 2024 is packed with interesting challenges for players to complete for Rift Fragments, Bloodpoints, and an event-specific currency that'll help you earn exclusive cosmetics from the event store. These are what I always play to collect because they're around for two weeks of the year, and then they're gone. So you can show them off forever because of all your extra effort.


All Dead by Daylight Twisted Masquerade challenges and how to complete them


Screenshot by Destructoid


Below, I've lis…
articles.title: All Dead by Daylight Twisted Masquerade challenges and how to complete them

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
It's no secret that Helldivers 2 is rich with references to Starship Troopers. But why stop there? The Viper Commando Warbond gives Predator and Commando fans something to look forward to in the game. Here are all the items in the Viper Commandos Warbond in Helldivers 2 and their costs.


You can find the Viper Commandos Warbond in the Acquisition Menu, accessible while in your Super Destroyer ship. Scroll down until you see it below the previous Warbond, Polar Patriots. As it is a Premium Warbond, you can only get it by exchanging 1,000 Super Credits (SC). If you haven't farmed enough credits, you can consider purchasing the currency you need via the 'Super Credits' tab in the Acquisition Center. Keep in mind that it's $10 for 1,000 SC. 


Image via Arrowhead Games/Sony


Unlike previous …
articles.title: Helldivers 2: Everything in the Viper Commandos Warbond and their costs

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
It was almost a year ago that we learned of modern console port plans for Parasol Stars: The Story of Bubble Bobble 3. Now ININ has come through with a date, opening the umbrella for a smooth glide to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox consoles on July 11, 2024.


With that lovely news comes an appropriately bubbly release date trailer, showing some footage of the port and promising "many quality-of-life enhancements." Please, enjoy another pre-release peek at Bub and Bob in their stout little human forms and prep for the arrival of the Rainbow Islands sequel below.




As for what those enhancements are, the updated port has added in the usual retro bells and whistles, namely the inclusion of save states and the ability to rewind gameplay. There are also shaders and filters that aim to recreate the experience of playing on a CRT screen. Beyond that, the hook here is very much the ability to play and own a relatively obscure entry in Taito's storied series.


There's no mention of including the other versions — which spanned Atari ST, Amiga, Game Boy, and NES — so it looks like we're just getting the PC Engine/Turbografx-16 version of Parasol Stars. That's fine and dandy, especially considering the fact that it's priced at a cool $9.99. Nintendo Switch pre-orders are live now and 10 percent off until July 12, with Xbox pre-orders to follow on June 19. The game can also be wishlisted on PlayStation. 

The post Parasol Stars: The Story of Bubble Bobble 3 floats down to consoles on July 11 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Parasol Stars: The Story of Bubble Bobble 3 floats down to consoles on July 11

articles.author: Christian Dawson
articles.description:
It appears we won't simply be bashing Vex frames in the first Destiny 2 Episode. No, we're also doing science by collecting radiolite samples and specimens. If you've peaked at the Seasonal Challenges, you'll know that we're collecting several of these samples over the next few weeks. 


Here's how to get the first: Specimen ID: NES001 in the new Destiny 2 seasons replacement. 


Destiny 2 Episodes: Previously, on Failsafe's adventures...


Samples Deposited


Partway through "A Rising Chorus: Act I," Failsafe will ask you to deposit the samples you had collected earlier into the Radiolite Bay. This futuristic trash can behind you and to the left is where you'll deposit all future samples.


Failsafe has also devised a way to mine more radiolite veins by pushing them to the surface with a …
articles.title: How to complete Specimen ID: NES001 in Destiny 2

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Guilds in Cookie Run: Kingdom are great for gaining new cookies and treasures through its gacha system, fighting bosses for valuable rewards, and chatting with fellow community members. However, with thousands of guilds to join, you may eventually want to leave your current one in hopes of finding a more active group or creating your own.


How to leave your guild in Cookie Run Kingdom


Below are the exact steps to leaving your guild in Cookie Run Kingdom:



Tap on your guild's banner in the top-left corner of your screen to head into its main menu.


Tap the banner again to ring up the Guild Info menu.


Press "Leave" and confirm your selection to leave your guild.



Once you leave a guild, you'll have to wait 24 hours to join or create another and wait seven days to rejoin the guild i…
articles.title: How to leave a guild in Cookie Run Kingdom

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
Amidst the flurry of Steam Next Fest demos, Codename: Ocean Keeper from RetroStyle Games emerges as a standout, blending underwater mecha action with the survival challenges of Vampire Survivors. Quite the exciting twist, and one that brings with it an interesting new take on the action survival roguelike genre.


At first glance, Codename: Ocean Keeper entices with its premise, merging the allure of ancient horrors with the futuristic focus of underwater mech combat. Players assume the role of a pilot tasked with navigating treacherous undersea environments teeming with monstrous creatures. Drawing from the survival roguelike elements of Vampire Survivors, the game challenges players to scavenge for resources, upgrade their mech, and battle increasingly formidable adversaries.


Gameplay …
articles.title: Codename: Ocean Keeper is Vampire Survivors with an underwater mecha twist

articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.description:
Tired of spending hundreds of dollars on high roaming fees during your international trips? GigSky is here to help with their low-cost International eSIM Data Plans.


With GigSky, you can pay a fraction of the cost for a cellular data plan, make a couple of small changes in your phone settings, and have instant, high-quality cellular data the moment you land for your international trip.


Trusted by over 250,000 travelers around the world and with an above-average 4.6 rating out of nearly 800 customer reviews on Apple’s App Store, GigSky is the premier choice for all your international travel data needs.


What is GigSky?


Founded in 2010 and headquartered in Silicon Valley, GigSky has been a champion of global mobility and an advocate of consumer choice for over a decade. They are the f…
articles.title: Traveling internationally this year? Bypass those pesky cellular roaming fees with a low-cost eSIM Data Plan from GigSky!

articles.description:
Reviewed on:
      PlayStation 5
      
Platform:
      PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC

After 10 years of storytelling, the overarching saga that was introduced in the original launch of Destiny has finally concluded. With The Final Shape, Bungie ties a bow on the vast majority of its lingering plotlines and questions and sets the stage for a new direction in subsequent releases. Ahead of that, this concluding chapter is extremely satisfying, offering a rousing, heartfelt, and character-driven wrap-up that does right by what has come before. From narrative to gameplay, this is not the installment that welcom…

When I first played Astro's Playroom on the PlayStation 5, I was blown away by its gorgeous art style, engaging level design, and overwhelming charm. Each level was so carefully packed with easter eggs and fun platforming challenges that I assumed it was a positive side-effect of the game's short playtime; the only way so much delight could be crammed into each stage was because the development team only had so many levels to work with, so a longer game would probably feel less impressive. But after going hands-on with Astro Bot, the full-fledged sequel from Team Asobi, I can …

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
Sony released the list of its highest-downloaded games across all its platforms in May, and Rare’s Sea of Thieves has topped the PS5 charts in two territories. The former Xbox exclusive first arrived on the platform on April 30. 
A PlayStation Blog post reveals that Sea of Thieves was the best-selling PS5 title across the US/Canada and the EU, beating out top-performing games like Grand Theft Auto V, Madden NFL 24, and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III. That's quite the debut and shows that PlayStation owners have an appetite for the open-world co-op pirate game. It’s also worth noting that Grounded, another first-party Xbox exclusive that was brought to PlayStation in April, placed 11th on this list (for the US/Canada). 
Here’s the full list of top 20 best-selling PS5 games in the US/Canada for May:
Sea of Thieves
Madden NFL 24
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
Helldivers 2
NBA 2K24
MLB The Show 24
Stellar Blade
Fallout 4
Who’s Your Daddy?!
Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege
Grounded
Another Crab’s Treasure
Marvel’s Spider-Man 2
NHL 24
Killer Klown’s From Outer Space: The Game
Rise of the Ronin
Assassin’s Creed Mirage
WWE 2K24
Elden Ring
For more on Sea of Thieves, we spoke to Rare to reflect on the series shortly before its PS5 launch. You can read that retrospective here.
[Source: PlayStation Blog]
articles.title: Sea Of Thieves Was The Most Downloaded PlayStation 5 Game In May

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
Square Enix held a special livestream today for Life is Strange: Double Exposure, which was revealed during last week's Xbox Games Showcase. The 48-minute presentation sits down with the game’s developers and performers to shed new light on Max Caulfield’s return to the franchise and her new powers while showing off extended gameplay. 
The story seemingly unfolds a few years after the events of Life is Strange. Max has moved far away from Arcadia Bay for a fresh start and now works as an artist-in-residence at Caledon University in upstate Vermont. She has sworn to never use her time-rewind ability again, and hasn't since the first game's conclusion. Despite this, Max’s power has evolved. She can now travel between two timelines, an ability called Shift. Unfortunately, she only discovers t…
articles.title: Life Is Strange: Double Exposure Video Shares Extended Gameplay And Reveals How It Acknowledges The Original Game's Endings

Developer:

Growing up, I didn't spend much time watching anime outside of the Pokémon animated series after school each day. However, friends kept telling me about this incredible show from Japan called Dragon Ball Z. While I have gone back and experienced the legendary anime in adulthood, as a kid, streaming wasn't an option, so outside of catching a few episodes airing on Toonami, I was extremely late to the DBZ anime party. However, in early 2003, I went to my local game rental shop and picked up Dragon Ball Z: Budokai. For this reason, Dragon Ball Z: Budokai became the primary way I interacted with the Dragon …
articles.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero Let's You See What Happens If Piccolo Didn't help Goku Defeat Raditz

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
PlayStation is rolling out an update in the coming weeks that will finally allow players to join a Discord voice chat directly from their PS5 consoles. Currently, you can only use Discord on PS5 after first joining a voice chat group via a PC or phone, which is quite a cumbersome step to take in order to talk with friends while gaming. 
The update will gradually roll out to PS5 players in the coming weeks, starting first with Japan and Asia, followed by Europe, Australia and New Zealand, and the Middle East, and finally, North and South America. You will need to update your console to the latest system software and link your PlayStation Network and Discord accounts in order to take advantage of this upcoming feature. 


To start a Discord voice chat directly from a PS5, players need to select the Discord tab in the Control Center's Game Base. Here, choose a Discord server or DM group you'd like to join, select your preferred voice channel, and you're set. You will receive a notification when another Discord user calls you, too, allowing you to join immediately. 
This upcoming update will arrive more than two years after PlayStation gave players the ability to link their PSN accounts to Discord back in 2021. 
Are you excited about this update? Let us know in the coming weeks!
articles.title: PlayStation Rolling Out Update To Allow Players To Join Discord Chat Directly From PS5

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Platform:
      PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Switch, PC
      
Publisher:
      Fellow Traveller
      
Developer:
      Jump Over The Age
      
Release:
                      	2025			
            
Rating:
      Teen
      
Citizen Sleeper took me by surprise in 2022, giving me a rare new video game experience, both mechanically and narratively, and my dice-centric role-playing adventure has stuck with me since. I still think about my Sleeper and what they're up to now. In a year where Elden Ring didn't release, it would have been my game of the year with a bullet – read my Citizen Sleeper review here to find out why. Now, a little more than two years later, I've played parts of the opening hour of Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector and find myself desperate to play more. It brings bac…
articles.title: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector Preview – On The Run, Again

articles.author: Lucas White
articles.description:
Reviewed on:
      PC

      PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, PC
      
Publisher:

Developer:
